title: Project A
description: I developed Flixxit, a Netflix-like web app using React.js and Node.js, enabling users to sign up, search, watch, save content, and subscribe for full access, ensuring a seamless user experience.

title: Project B
description: I designed a user-friendly website for plant enthusiasts with donation and purchase features, using HTML/CSS for the frontend, JavaScript for the backend, and MySQL for data management.
